document_data.name: Marimmar
document_data.History:
Marimmar was a good but slow magic teacher who over-estimated his powers. At one point, he started tutoring the young Narm in the magic arts.

In [[1357 DR]], he decided against all prudence to travel to the ruined [[Myth Drannor]] to acquire magical treasure but Marimmar was quickly killed by the [[devil]]s there.
